name: blessedly
content:

in a way that is welcome or feels like a relief : The procedure was blessedly quick and painless, and we were on our way within ten minutes. Yesterday brought a lot of problems, but today has been blessedly free of stress. Related word
blessed (LUCK)
More examplesFewer examplesWe were blessedly spared from having to hear about his surgery. The election campaign has been blessedly normal and free of bizarre rallies, speeches, and stunts. Blessedly, there are many friends and neighbours nearby, willing to help my uncle out with anything he needs.
